title: cross compile error `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_codegen_llvm/back/archive.rs:274:33

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust cargo build --release --target armv7-linux-androideabi -p codechat ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.45.0 (5c1f21c3b 2020-07-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 5c1f21c3b82297671ad3ae1e8c942d2ca92e84f2 commit-date: 2020-07-13 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.45.0 LLVM version: 10.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling aes-soft v0.4.0 Compiling block-modes v0.5.0 Compiling des v0.4.0 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_codegen_llvm/back/archive.rs:274:33 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.45.0 (5c1f21c3b 2020-07-13) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C linker-plugin-lto -C linker=/Users/admin/.NDK/arm/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-clang -C lto=on -C embed-bitcode=yes --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden error: could not compile `openssl-sys`. To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling md-5 v0.9.1 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_codegen_llvm/back/archive.rs:274:33 stack backtrace: 0: ::fmt 1: core::fmt::write 2: std::io::Write::write_fmt 3: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} 4: std::panicking::default_hook 5: rustc_driver::report_ice 6: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook 7: rust_begin_unwind 8: core::panicking::panic_fmt 9: core::panicking::panic 10: ::build 11: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::link::link_binary 12: rustc_session::utils::::time 13: ::link 14: rustc_interface::queries::Linker::link 15: rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler_in_existing_thread_pool 16: rustc_ast::attr::with_globals note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.45.0 (5c1f21c3b 2020-07-13) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C linker-plugin-lto -C linker=/Users/admin/.NDK/arm/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-clang -C lto=on -C embed-bitcode=yes --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `openssl-sys`. To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed ```
